monster.name: Ascended Archon
monster.languages: Primordial, and any languages you know

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Arcana + PB, History + PB, Religion + PB

trait.name: Astral Step
trait.text: Whenever the Archon casts a spell, it can teleport a number of feet equal to 10 times the spell level (minimum 10) to an unoccupied space it sees.

action.name: Arcane Blast
action.text: Once on its turn, the Archon forgo one attack to cause a burst of magic at a point it can see within 60 feet. Creatures within 5 feet must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take damage as if they had been hit by one of your Iridescent Strikes.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v3.0.1 p. 5 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Air Archon
monster.languages: Auran, and any languages you know

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Acrobatics + PB, Stealth + PB

trait.name: Bluster
trait.text: Whenever the Archon deals thunder damage to a creature with an Iridescent Strike, it can knock it back 10 feet in a straight line. This distance is halved for each size the target is above the Archon.

trait.name: Elder Elemental
trait.text: Whenever the Archon deals lighting or thunder damage, it ignores resistance, and treats immunity to those damage types as resistance.

trait.name: Gaseous
trait.text: The Archon can move through any space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing, and it does not provoke opportunity attacks while it is flying.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v3.0.1 p. 7 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Fire Archon
monster.languages: Ignan, and any languages you know

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Acrobatics + PB, Intimidation + PB

trait.name: Elder Elemental
trait.text: Whenever the Archon deals fire or radiant damage, it ignores resistance, and treats immunity to those damage types as resistance.

trait.name: Ignite
trait.text: Whenever the Archon deals fire damage to a creature with an Iridescent Strike, it can ignite it if it is flammable. Ignited targets take CHA fire damage at the end of each of their turns until they drop prone or a creature uses its action to extinguish the flames.

trait.name: Illumination
trait.text: The Archon sheds bright light out to a 30-foot radius and dim light 30 feet beyond that.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v3.0.1 p. 7 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Earth Archon
monster.languages: Terran, and any languages you know

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Athletics + PB, Intimidation + PB

trait.name: Elder Elemental
trait.text: Whenever the Archon deals bludgeoning, it ignores resistance, and treats immunity to bludgeoning damage as resistance.

trait.name: Rock Solid
trait.text: Whenever the Archon deals bludgeoning damage to a creature with an Iridescent Strike, it can halve its speed until the start of your next turn. It can impose this effect on each creature once per turn.

trait.name: Siege Monster
trait.text: When the Archon deals bludgeoning damage to a non-magical object or structure, it deals the maximum possible damage instead of rolling.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v3.0.1 p. 7 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Water Archon
monster.languages: Aquan, and any languages you know

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Acrobatics + PB, Stealth + PB

trait.name: Aqueous
trait.text: The Archon can breathe normally in both air and water, and it can move through spaces as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Elder Elemental
trait.text: When the Archon deals bludgeoning or cold damage, it ignores resistance, and it treats immunity to those damage types as resistance.

trait.name: Flowing Resilience
trait.text: When the Archon takes damage it can use a reaction to reduce it by CHA and move up to 15 feet without provoking opportunity attacks. It cannot use this reaction on force or psychic damage.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v3.0.1 p. 7 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Cursed Archon
monster.languages: Infernal, and any languages you know

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Athletics + PB, Stealth + PB

trait.name: Frenzy
trait.text: When the Archon takes the Attack action, it can choose to enter a Frenzy which lasts until the start of your next turn. For the duration, all of its attacks, and all attacks against the Archon have advantage.

trait.name: Infernal Drain
trait.text: Once per turn when the Archon deals fire damage with an Iridescent Strike, its temporary hit points increase by CHA. Your total temporary hit points cannot exceed twice your Vessel level.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v3.0.1 p. 8 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Fallen Archon
monster.languages: Celestial, and any languages you know

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Intimidation + PB, Religion + PB

trait.name: Celestial Ward
trait.text: As a bonus action, the Archon grants one target it can see within 30 feet CHA temporary hit points. It cannot target itself with this feature.

trait.name: Divine Challenge
trait.text: If the Archon deals radiant damage to a creature with a melee weapon, that creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than the Archon until the start of your next turn.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v3.0.1 p. 10 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Formless Archon
monster.languages: Primordial, and any languages you know

trait.name: Skills
trait.text: Deception + PB, Stealth + PB

trait.name: Pseudopod
trait.text: The Archon has a number of additional pseudopods equal to your CHA. These pseudopods can only be used for unarmed Iridescent Strikes, and have a reach of 10 feet. Creatures can attack these pseudopod limbs to damage the Archon directly.

trait.name: Sticky Slime
trait.text: When the Archon hits a creature equal to its size or smaller with a melee Iridescent Strike, the target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be grappled. As an action, a grappled creature can make a Strength saving throw, escaping on a success.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v3.0.1 p. 11 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Trickster Archon
monster.languages: Sylvan, and any languages you know

trait.name: Skills
trait.text: Deception + PB, Stealth + PB

trait.name: Stolen Memory
trait.text: Once per turn when the Archon deals psychic damage with an Iridescent Strike, it can force the target to make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, it cannot see, hear, smell, sense, or target the Archon in any way until the start of your next turn.

trait.name: Juxtapose
trait.text: As a bonus action, the Archon can force a creature it can see within 60 feet to make a Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it instantly switches places with the Archon. A creature can willingly fail the save.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v3.0.1 p. 11 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Spirit Familiar
monster.languages: any spoken by your Archon Form

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 8 + CHA

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 5 + your Vessel level

trait.name: Hit Dice
trait.text: The Spirit Familiar has a number of d4 Hit Dice equal to your Vessel level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The Spirit Familiar has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Vessel Bond
trait.text: You add your PB to any ability checks or saving throws that your Spirit Familiar makes.

action.name: Invisibility
action.text: The Familiar magically turns invisible until it attacks or forces a target to make an ability check or saving throw. Equipment it is wearing or carrying turns invisible with it. The Familiar must concentrate on this effect as if it were concentrating on a spell.

action.name: Spirit Strike
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: Your Spell Attack Modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 damage of the same type as your Iridescent Strike.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v3.0.1 p. 14 (Homebrew)
